-State-of-the-art hydraulic power plant for maximum production efficiency.

ğŸ’¥ DEFECTIVE CANS? NEVER A PROBLEM AGAIN! ğŸ’¥
Out-of-standard cans of tomatoes, legumes, preserved foods or beverage cans don't have to slow you down. 

With the automatic balers:

-You press the defective cans with the contents.
-You separate the product from the can in one process.
-You recover 100 percent of the material for #recycling.

Result? More speed, zero #waste and optimized costs.
